definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Please attach copy of your HKID card or registration slip(s).
sentences.chinese: 请附身份证或注册证副本。

sentences.english: Anyone who loses his resident identity card shall apply for reissue of a card.
sentences.chinese: 居民身份证丢失的，应当申请补领。

sentences.english: In the desert Bridgit gives Gaines the ID.
sentences.chinese: 在沙漠中，布瑞吉特将马丁的身份证交给了盖恩斯。

sentences.english: Participant(s) who fail to produce valid identity documents will not be permitted to participate in the race.
sentences.chinese: 未能出示有效身份证明文件的参赛者，不得出赛。

sentences.english: If you do not have a VTCRN / Staff No. , please fill in HKID No…
sentences.chinese: 如你没有职训局雇员编号，请填上香港身份证号码。

sentences.english: Anyone whose identity card is lost shall file an application for a new card.
sentences.chinese: 居民身份证丢失的，应当申请补领。

sentences.english: To use the Internet you must show a valid I. D.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想上网，必须要出示有效的身份证件。

sentences.english: Copy of Residence record, personal ID and passport.
sentences.chinese: 户口薄和身份证复印件及护照。

sentences.english: Of course. You just show your I. D. to them, then you may go in.
sentences.chinese: 当然可以，你只要人他们看你的身份证就可以进入。

sentences.english: Copy of HKID Card and Driving License of the driver.
sentences.chinese: 司机的香港身份证及驾驶执照副本。

sentences.english: Employee class contains the name and ID number.
sentences.chinese: Employee类包含姓名和身份证号。

sentences.english: Her national identity card, she said, had been changed to reflect the false birth-date.
sentences.chinese: 她说她的身份证上的出生日期被改了。

sentences.english: When you do the exam you must bring the same identity card.
sentences.chinese: 考试当日，您必须使用同一张身份证件参加考试。

sentences.english: In many countries, a driving license is a valid proof of indentity .
sentences.chinese: 驾驶执照在很多国家是有效的身份证明。

sentences.english: And the type of proof that the rabbinate prefers is peculiarly unsuited to Jewish life in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 而他们偏好的身份证明，是美籍犹太人非常不适应的。

definition: to report the loss of something
